it.escape.core.client.model

Class PlayerState

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.escape.core.client.model.PlayerState
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MyPlayerState

    public class PlayerState
extends java.lang.Object
    This class in client.model defines: Name, Status, LastNoiseLocation of a Player. It is updated by the UpdaterSwing in the Controller, according to the messages the ServerSocketCore sends.

      void setMyStatus(CurrentPlayerStatus proposedStatus)
      This functions updates the CurrentPlayerStatus, if and *only if* the priority level of the proposed status is >= than the priority level of the current status.
